title.bibl: Svenska Tribunen-Nyheter, July 17, 1906. Our Children in the Public Schools

div.bibl: Svenska Tribunen-Nyheter, July 17, 1906. OUR CHILDREN IN THE PUBLIC SCHOOLS

body.p: Eleven of Chicago's public schools opened yesterday for the summer session and twelve thousand children enrolled for the term. While a detailed list has not been presented, the number of students of Swedish descent is unusually large. Our Chicago Swedish colony is being complimented regarding our interest in having our children take advantage of every possible educational opportunity.
